Comment.value:
SC1 - On the door, this conversation should pop up the first time a pc clicks on the door. Through here the pc can be nice and be let into the room or be rude and the kobolds will not unlock the door. The door can be either bashed or the lock can be picked. Both should be fairly easy.
SC2 - If the PC is rude and the door is not unlocked, then the pc should get this dialogue.
SC3 - When the pc steps on the trigger, if a weapon is in hand, then this dialogue should pop up, and then the kobolds should attack.
SC4 - When the PC steps on the trigger, if no weapon is in hand, then this should pop up.
SC4 - If the PC steps on the trigger, and the door was not unlocked by the kobold, then the kobold will say this line. The next heartbeat, if the pc still has his/her wepaon out, the kobolds should attack.
